desc: This card represents the money you have. You can exchange money for products and use it in certain events.

name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon (LOB)
desc: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

name: Dark Magician (LOB)
desc: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon (SDK)
desc: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

name: Dark Magician (SDY)
desc: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

name: Gaia The Fierce Knight (Common)
desc: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

name: Curse of Dragon (Common)
desc: A wicked dragon that taps into dark forces to execute a powerful attack.

name: Celtic Guardian (Common)
desc: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

name: Giant Soldier of Stone (Common)
desc: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.

name: Mystical Elf (Common)
desc: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

name: Man-Eater Bug (Common)
desc: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it.

name: Hane-Hane (Common)
desc: FLIP: Select 1 monster on the field and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Dark Hole (Common)
desc: Destroy all monsters on the field.

name: Fissure (Common)
desc: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK (your choice, if tied).

name: Monster Reborn (Common)
desc: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

name: Trap Hole (Common)
desc: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monster with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monster; destroy that target.

name: Two-Pronged Attack (Common)
desc: Select and destroy 2 of your monsters and 1 of your opponent's monsters.

name: Dragon Capture Jar (Common)
desc: Change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Defense Position, also they cannot change their battle positions.

name: Exodia the Forbidden One (DDS)
desc: If you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

name: Oscillo Hero #2
desc: A creature that electrocutes opponents with bolts of lightning.

name: Summoned Skull (Ultra)
desc: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

name: Change of Heart (Ultra)
desc: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.
